Package com.example.eventlotto

Class FirestoreService

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlotto.FirestoreService
public class FirestoreService extends Object
Combined FirestoreService Includes: - User profile CRUD (deviceId-based) - Event and Notification methods (team version) - Utility helpers
